song_name: Life in the Mines - Donkey Kong Country Returns
metrics_conclusion: Life in the Mines - Donkey Kong Country Returns has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Life in the Mines - Donkey Kong Country Returns is written in the key of G Dorian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 5th most popular key among Dorian keys and     the 34th most popular  among all keys. The G Dorian scale is similar to the G Minor scale except that its 6th note is a half step higher (E).  Chord progressions in Dorian have a characteristic sound due to the major quality of the chord built on the 4th scale degree. 

See the G Dorian Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
